amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to provide funding in the Community Development Block Grant program to examine the application of grant funds to mitigating and remediating the effects of pyrrhotite-related residential damage.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A020) offered by Mr. Courtney.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Courtney amendment (A020) Agreed to by voice vote.
